qa_pairs.question: How many child and adolescent mental health clinics are listed in this Manhattan resource guide?
qa_pairs.answer: Ten clinics are listed: Mount Sinai Child/Adolescent/Family Services, Northside Center, JBFCS, Johnson Center, Metropolitan Center for Mental Health, Harlem Hospital, St. Luke's/Roosevelt Hospital, Upper Manhattan Mental Health Services, North General Hospital, and Ackerman Institute for the Family
